

.. _sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_01-geometry:

Geometry examples
=================
这些示例演示了如何使用 PyMAPDL 创建基本几何图形。



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="本例演示了如何使用关键点命令创建基本几何体。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/01-geometry/images/thumb/sphx_glr_00-keypoints_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_01-geometry_00-keypoints.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Keypoints</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="本例演示如何使用“线”命令创建基本几何体。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/01-geometry/images/thumb/sphx_glr_01-lines_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_01-geometry_01-lines.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Lines</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="本例演示如何使用 area 命令创建基本几何体。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/01-geometry/images/thumb/sphx_glr_02-areas_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_01-geometry_02-areas.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Areas</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="本例演示了如何使用体积命令创建基本几何体。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/01-geometry/images/thumb/sphx_glr_03-volumes_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_01-geometry_03-volumes.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Volumes</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="此示例显示用于创建 volume 的不同命令，例如块、圆柱体等。">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /examples/gallery_examples/01-geometry/images/thumb/sphx_glr_04-primitives_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_examples_gallery_examples_01-geometry_04-primitives.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Primitives</div>
    </div>
